backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing storage, access control, chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and media validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a category-tag UI update to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root setting up TanStack Router routes, layout, footer visibility, and 404 behavior.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting preset avatars, uploading custom images, or removing the current avatar.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface handling message retrieval, auto-scroll, replies, pinned video display, and message sending.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter and handles fallback thumbnail fetching.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating a chatroom with topic, description, media uploads, and YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URL validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the site header with navigation, username editing, avatar selection, and back-to-lobby logic.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds (YouTube/Twitch/Twitter), pinning, replies, and voice playback.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with text, image uploads, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter links, and optional audio recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React component that plays audio messages with a waveform visualization, playback controls, and syncing with other audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating chat-related data, using the backend actor and local user metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, layout rules, and mobile input adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility for formatting numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utilities for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating thumbnails or embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a chatroom, handles loading and error states, and increments the room’s view count once loaded.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays the chatroom lobby with search, category filtering, and creation dialog, selecting data from multiple query sources based on active filters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, architecture, and known issues for the Chattr chatroom application.
